name: Killer Radishes
description:
Oh no! You used PLUTONIUM as fertiliser by error and now you have to deal with the consequences...

Killer Radishes is a difficult-fast-paced-bullet-helly-shooter-thing where you shoot radishes. Please run it full screen ;)

Controls

Kick (Right click)
Piercing bullet (E)
Roll (Space)
Shoot (Left click)

Enjoy!
